welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oakland Park, the charming city known for its beautiful parks and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pompano Beach Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pompano Beach Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: The newest and largest concourse at Miami International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: A concourse dedicated to international flights and home to the airport's largest duty-free shopping area.

terminals.name: Concourse F
terminals.description: A concourse primarily used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse G
terminals.description: A concourse serving mainly international flights and home to the airport's Federal Inspection Services (FIS) facility.

terminals.name: Concourse H
terminals.description: A concourse primarily used by American Airlines and its partners for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
